Room.Name: Necropolis Path
Room.ShortDescription: You stand at an intersection in the path leading north, south, and west.
Room.LongDescription: The Walk of Lords, a monument to the lords and ladies of Oceancrest's past, lies to the north. Should you continue to the west, there is a similar monument to the great Heroes of Oceancrest, along with the Sage's Rest. The southern path leads directly to the entrance of the Lyanden Tomb.
